item.title: 特朗普贸易威胁激发避险需求，黄金再创新高
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周将大幅升级贸易关税，加剧了人们对全球经济的担忧，并刺激了避险需求，黄金在新季度伊始创下了历史新高。【原文：Gold hit a record at the start of the new quarter as a major escalation in US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs due this week heightened concerns about the global economy and fanned haven demand.】

item.title: 黄金反弹推动南非矿商创下历史最佳月度业绩
item.description: 金价飙升推动南非矿业股创下历史最佳月度表现，使该国基准指数免受全球市场混乱的影响。【原文：The surging gold price has propelled South African mining stocks to their best monthly performance on record, shielding the country’s benchmark index from the mayhem in global markets.】

item.title: 英国全国房地产协会称，英国房价增长在税收冲击前停滞不前
item.description: 英国房价七个月来首次没有增长，这表明由于一项重大税收减免政策将于今天到期，购房者在出价时可能会更加谨慎。【原文：UK house prices failed to grow for the first time in seven months, in a sign that buyers may be showing more restraint with their offers due to the expiration today of a major tax break.】

item.title: 2 亿英镑改造后，贝恩支持的英国保险公司着眼于英国的增长
item.description: 英国家庭和汽车保险公司 Esure Group Plc 首席执行官大卫-麦克米伦（David McMillan）表示，在实施了 2 亿英镑（约合 2.58 亿美元）的改革计划后，该公司在英国的业务将进一步增长。【原文：UK home and motor insurance firm Esure Group Plc sees further growth in the country after a £200 million ($258 million) revamp program, according to its Chief Executive Officer David McMillan.】

item.title: 小米股价在 SU7 车祸致死报道后下跌
item.description: 小米公司股价在香港交易中下跌，此前这家科技巨头证实其一辆 SU7 电动汽车发生了事故。据当地媒体报道，事故造成三人死亡。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. shares dropped in Hong Kong trading after the technology giant confirmed one of its SU7 electric cars was involved in an accident. Local media reported three people died in the incident.】

item.title: 南非政界人士就至关重要的预算案展开辩论，兰特大幅波动
item.description: 随着联合政府中两个主要合作伙伴之间旨在确保就国家预算达成协议的会谈继续进行，南非兰特汇率出现波动。【原文：South Africa’s rand gyrated as talks between the two main partners in the coalition government aimed at securing a deal on the national budget continued.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：全球大跌后英国股市有望反弹
外资因看好印度经济复苏而加速买入印度股票
item.description: 外国投资者正在加快购买印度股票，希望在即将到来的财报季之前印度股市继续复苏，同时也受益于近期大跌后较低的估值。【原文：Foreign investors are accelerating their purchases of Indian equities on hopes of continued recovery ahead of the upcoming earnings season, while also benefiting from lower valuations following a recent selloff.】

item.title: 印度央行行长力求灵活机动促进经济增长
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，印度货币当局将 "积极主动、敏捷灵活 "地促进亚洲第三大经济体的增长。【原文：India’s central bank Governor Sanjay Malhotra said that the monetary authority will be “proactive, agile and flexible” to bolster growth in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 禁令解除，外国人推动韩国股票卖空激增
item.description: 由于韩国结束了长达 17 个月的做空韩国股票禁令，海外投资者推动了周一做空韩国股票的热潮。【原文：Overseas investors drove a jump in short-selling of Korean stocks on Monday as the nation ended a 17-month ban on the trading tactic.】

item.title: 韩国最高政治领导人面临一系列法律障碍
item.description: 韩国宪法法院将于 4 月 4 日宣布对总统尹锡烈弹劾案的判决，这距离他实施戒严令的错误决定已经过去了四个月。尹锡烈此举引发了韩国数十年来最严重的宪政危机。【原文：South Korea’s Constitutional Court will announce its verdict on President Yoon Suk Yeol’s impeachment on April 4, four months after his ill-fated decision to impose martial law. Yoon unleashed South Korea’s worst constitutional crisis in decades with the move, which he rescinded in six hours after parliament overturned it.】

item.title: 中国生物技术股因盈利改善和更多交易而上涨
item.description: 受主要企业盈利好于预期以及投资者在美国关税迫在眉睫之前寻求防御性行业的推动，中国生物技术股周二反弹。【原文：Chinese biotechnology stocks rallied on Tuesday, driven by better-than-expected earnings from key players and investors seeking defensive sectors ahead of the looming US tariffs.】

item.title: 国防类股飙升带动欧洲在本季度跑赢美国
item.description: 欧洲防务股在该地区股市历史性的一季度中表现优异，独占鳌头。一些投资者仍在试图增加仓位。【原文：European defense stocks dominated a historic quarter of outperformance for the region’s equities. And some investors are still trying to increase their positions.】

item.title: Tinder 推出好玩的人工智能聊天机器人，旨在提高参与度
item.description: Match Group Inc. 旗下的 Tinder 推出了一款应用内游戏，邀请用户与人工智能聊天机器人调情，这是该公司通过提高用户参与度来恢复约会应用增长的更大努力的一部分。【原文：Match Group Inc.’s Tinder unveiled an in-app game that invites users to flirt with artificially intelligent chatbots, part of a larger effort to return the dating app to growth by boosting user engagement.】

item.title: 苏黎世收购英国并购保险公司股份，推动美国和欧洲业务扩张
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团已同意收购 Icen Risk 公司的少数股份，后者是一家专门为并购提供保险的公司。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group has agreed to acquire a minority stake in Icen Risk, a company that specializes in insuring mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 特朗普对俄罗斯石油的威胁促使印度寻求替代品
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对俄罗斯实施更多惩罚，引发了人们对石油流动可能中断的担忧，印度炼油商急忙返回市场寻求原油供应。【原文：Indian refiners have rushed back to the market to seek crude supply after President Donald Trump’s threat of more penalties against Russia raised concerns over potential disruptions to oil flows.】

item.title: 软银为美国人工智能项目寻求创纪录的 165 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，软银集团公司正在寻求一笔高达 165 亿美元的贷款，以帮助为在美国的人工智能投资提供资金，这将是这家科技投资者有史以来最大的一笔仅以美元计价的贷款。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is seeking a loan of as much as $16.5 billion to help fund artificial intelligence investments in the US, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the tech investor’s largest-ever facility denominated solely in dollars.】

item.title: 澳大利亚维持关键利率不变，全球为特朗普关税做好准备
item.description: 澳大利亚央行在一项广受期待的决定中维持关键利率不变，称希望在进一步放宽政策之前看到更多证据表明通胀正在可持续地回到目标水平。【原文：Australia’s central bank kept its key interest rate unchanged in a widely expected decision, saying it wants to see more evidence that inflation is moving sustainably back to target before easing further.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印尼信贷在财政困境中遭遇 2023 年以来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 由于对政府政策的担忧削弱了投资者的信心，印尼企业美元债券利差创下两年来最大单月涨幅。【原文：Indonesian corporate dollar bond spreads saw their biggest monthly jump in two years as concerns over government policy dented investor confidence.】

item.title: 美国芯片补助金陷入困境，路特尼克推动加大投资力度
item.description: 据八位熟悉内情的人士透露，商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）已表示，他可能会扣留承诺的《芯片法案》补助金，因为他正在推动那些正在申请联邦半导体补贴的公司大幅扩大其在美国的项目。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick has signaled he could withhold promised Chips Act grants as he pushes for companies in line for federal semiconductor subsidies to substantially expand their US projects, according to eight people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 为什么中国无法解决房地产市场的混乱局面？
item.description: 中国的房地产市场曾经是中国经济增长的最大动力之一，但五年来，中国的房地产市场一直在螺旋式下滑，没有丝毫减弱的迹象。房地产价值持续暴跌，陷入经济困境的家庭被迫出售房产，在投机项目上背负巨额债务的公寓开发商濒临倒闭。【原文：Once one of the country’s biggest growth drivers, China’s property market has been in a downward spiral for five years with no signs of abating. Real estate values continue to plummet, households in financial distress are being forced to sell properties, and apartment developers that have racked up enormous debt on speculative projects are on the brink of collapse.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总理称美国贸易目标 "不容谈判
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞（Anthony Albanese）拒绝了一个美国贸易机构对澳大利亚生物安全法和药品补贴制度的担忧，宣称这些问题 "不容谈判"。【原文：Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has rejected a US trade body’s concerns over his nation’s biosecurity laws and subsidized medicine system, declaring that they are “not up for negotiation.”】

item.title: 特朗普关税前夕亚洲各地工厂活动萎缩
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日宣布征收全球关税之前，亚洲一些最大的制造业国家 3 月份的活动进一步放缓。【原文：Activity in some of Asia’s largest manufacturing nations slowed further in March ahead of President Donald Trump’s global tariff announcement on April 2.】

item.title: 韩国将于 4 月 4 日对尹炳世总统弹劾案做出裁决
item.description: 韩国即将就被弹劾总统尹锡烈的政治命运作出裁决，决定是否因其短命的戒严令而将其永久免职，还是恢复其职务。【原文：South Korea is poised to rule on the political fate of impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol, deciding whether to permanently remove him from office for his short-lived martial law decree or reinstate him.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普加征关税，中国私营工厂指数仍高于预期
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国制造业活动以四个月来最快的速度增长，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）准备进一步提高对美国出口商品关税之际，中国制造业表现出的韧性将经受考验，令人惊讶。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity improved at the fastest pace in four months, according to a private survey, a surprising show of resilience that will be tested as Donald Trump prepares to raise tariffs further on exports into the US.】

item.title: 小野寺说，特朗普关税可能给日本带来经济危机
item.description: 日本执政党的一位资深议员说，特朗普政府的关税可能会给日本带来一场巨大的经济危机，他还说，特别是汽车关税将对日本所有地区产生巨大影响。【原文：The Trump administration’s tariffs may spell a big economic crisis for Japan, a senior lawmaker in Japan’s ruling party said, adding that the auto tariffs in particular would have huge implications across all regions in Japan.】
